scripts.deploy: webpack -p && npm run sass && gh-pages -d example -b gh-pages
scripts.start: webpack & npm run sass && npm run watch
scripts.watch: node-sass src/demo.sass example/demo.css -i -w & webpack --watch & browser-sync start --server example --files 'example/*, index.html'
scripts.prepublish: rm -rf example dist && babel src/ca11yndar -d dist & webpack src/standalone.js dist/window.ca11yndar.js -p
